text:
Documentation file "RUNNING" that comes with tomcat6 zip file (binary
distribution), says the following "Download and Install the J2SE Runtime
Environment" but it means the J2SE Development Kit since tomcat requires the
development kit.

Thank you.
creator: bmvakili@gmail.com
wrowe@apache.org
text:
You are confused because previously, Tomcat required a JDK to compile any JSP
pages into bytecode.  Tomcat 5.5 and later ship with their own compiler.
